# Education

## Geospatial Mapping & Remote Sensing

*`UBC Forestry - Natural Resources Conservation`*

Developing expertise in Geographic Information Systems software such as QGIS, ENVI and ArcGIS Pro, with applications to forest management, natural resource conservation and urban development. In addition to a strong conceptual understanding of projection mapping, Relational Database Management Systems, rasterization, and image processing.

-   Created maps to visualize animal habitat and its relations to urban develops, then building suitability models with ArcPy in ArcGIS Pro to simulate and project difference scenarios.
